title: Which dominates industrial–current–density CO2-to-C2+ electroreduction: Cuδ+ or the microenvironment?
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,2897-2907
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04147F, Paper
Ruoou Yang, Mao Wu, Danji Huang, Yan Yang, Yan Liu, Leiqian Zhang, Feili Lai, Bo You, Jiakun Fang, Tianxi Liu, Youwen Liu, Tianyou Zhai
We updated the CO2R mechanism that sharp morphology induced local microenvironments will dominate the highly active ICD-CO2R rather than the oxidation state.
